Content: Indeed it is, but not extra today!
Why do you say extra that?
I have to pay the extra bills today!
I've solved that problem last month when I moved back in with my parents!
I thought you said you were 40 years old?
45! So what, if they're stupid? Life is wonderful!
Not anymore, morron! This is your father! You're moving out today!
And this is your mother! You shouldn't have taught us to use this forum!
You were right, son, life is wonderful!
